time_markers.text: the first year we came into government
quotes: That first year we came into government was so hard, because [I was not used to the treatment from], not only donors, but international advisors, etc.

organizations.name: World Bank
quotes: Before I came into the government, I was employed by the World Bank as a senior aide coordinator for Palestine.

quotes: I was employed as a senior person, P5, for UN.

quotes: You are talking to somebody with two degrees from a first world country, who went to get her masters at LSE.
